title: Data Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at United Nations Capital Development Fund (Lusaka, Lusaka)
Interview Descriptions: The interview was average. The panel members not friendly but professional. Questions were bordering on the academic/theoretical nature but perhaps that is the nature of the environment they work in.

title: Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 6 months. I interviewed at United Nations Capital Development Fund
Interview Descriptions: Professional panel interview process with questions asked by a panel. Competency based questions that test prior experience and possession of skills relevant to the role applied for at the organisation.
Interview Questions: Question on fit for the role.

title: Communications Intern Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at United Nations Capital Development Fund (Port Moresby) in Apr 2021
Interview Descriptions:
Zoom interview with 3 people. It was pretty great as they kept the conversation going on a more less formal manner. 

The interviewers took turns asking me questions, most of which are related to my skills and experiences.
Interview Questions: How do you manage your time?

title: Program Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at United Nations Capital Development Fund (Paris) in Jan 2020
Interview Descriptions:
4 questions
1 in english
They will ask you your understanding of the job you ve applied for and your interest for local development. Try to give example in your answer , do not stay in the general . They want to be convinced that you understand what you are talking about .
Interview Questions:
Presentation
Understanding of the job
Interest in working for local development
Default and qualities

title: Policy Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at United Nations Capital Development Fund
Interview Descriptions: Introduce yourself and several questions. There are three people: two specialists and one HR. They asked what tools you used to search for investment projects. The internship is in the PPC unit.
Interview Questions:
Introduce yourself.
What is the searching tool you use?

title: Internship Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at United Nations Capital Development Fund in Jun 2018
Interview Descriptions: After submitting a written application, I had two rounds of interviews, one which was more behavioural and the second which was more focused on the subject matter expertise. Both interviews were conducted by phone call.
Interview Questions: Q: Why do you want to work with UNCDF? Q: What is an example of a digital financial service?

title: Intern Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at United Nations Capital Development Fund in Feb 2018
Interview Descriptions: Phone Interview two weeks after I sent out an email to apply online, personality questions only, introduced the project I would be assigned to, got an offer a few days after
Interview Questions: Why do you want to intern with us? What do you know about UNCDF?

title: Lead Specialist Transport Infrastructure Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 2+ months. I interviewed at United Nations Capital Development Fund (Kampala) in Jan 2018
Interview Descriptions: The process was very transparent and friendly. I was given ample time to  prepare, and I was received well. The interview was well organised and the team was friendly.  I was given chance to ask questions and received good responses.
Interview Questions: Explain to the panel the different road classes in Uganda.
